home.manifestTitle3: People who know how to create.
home.manifestSubtitle: A full-cycle creative agency where marketing and design unlock the creative and conceptual potential of brands, closing it in a continuous circle.
home.contactSubtitle: Book a consultation with our expert to discuss your project requirements and get tailored recommendations

home.servicesInteriorDesc: creating environments that strengthen the brand and shape customer experience
home.benefitsApproachDesc: We take on marketing entirely so you can focus on your business
home.benefitsHonestyDesc: We don't sell illusions, we deliver honest results
home.benefitsNoTemplatesDesc: A creative team that creates unique ideas and draws on trends from different fields

about.heroDescription: It all started with a small coffee shop where people's potential began to unfold. Five people turned chaos into a single rhythm. Different people, but equally driven, each adding their point to the circle. The points began to connect. Design. Marketing. Strategy. Meaning. Drive.
about.missionDescription: To create unique solutions through teamwork and a creative approach, uniting talents and ideas to achieve outstanding results. We believe that collaboration inspires, and together we can overcome any boundaries, turning bold ideas into vivid and impactful projects.
about.historyDescription: Starting with a small team, we founded our agency in August 2025 and keep growing. We started with the Steppe Coffee project, which showed us the real scale of our capabilities. One successful case led to the next, and we grew into a full-fledged agency. We now have several departments and ambitious plans for the future, but the goal remains the same: to do great projects and keep growing.

footer.description: Circle Creative Buro – a full-cycle creative and advertising agency in Almaty. We develop brands in digital space and beyond: strategy, creative, web, motion, turnkey interiors.
